name: Ext_R5_Composition_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Composition.status for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Composition.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Composition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: registered | partial | preliminary | final | amended | corrected | appended | cancelled | entered-in-error | deprecated | unknown
element.definition: The workflow/clinical status of this composition. The status is a marker for the clinical standing of the document.
element.comment: `Composition.status` maps to R4B `Composition.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
element.isModifierReason: This element is labelled as a modifier because it is a status element that contains status entered-in-error which means that the resource should not be treated as valid

element.short: registered | partial | preliminary | final | amended | corrected | appended | cancelled | entered-in-error | deprecated | unknown
element.definition: The workflow/clinical status of this composition. The status is a marker for the clinical standing of the document.
element.comment: `Composition.status` maps to R4B `Composition.status`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: The workflow/clinical status of the composition.
